segments.text: Here is an invitation for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , thank you . What is the occasion ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tomorrow is the tooth anniversary of our company . Our general manager invites you to a dinner party . Do you think you can manage it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes , I'd very much like to go .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is great . Dinner starts at 6
segments.speaker: S1
